roleset.name: establish areas for certain activities
roleset.note: ZONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'zone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from zone.01-v)

example.name: agentive adjective
example.text: This would be the department's first suit challenging a local zoning ordinance under 1988 amendments to the Fair Housing Act.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The government , applying urban planning principles , zoned the area for residential and industrial use , in order to create a construction site for the facility .
example.arg: The government , applying urban planning principles
in order to create a construction site for the facility

roleset.name: not pay attention to some major stimulus
roleset.note: ZONE_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from zone.02-v)

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: I think on days like those , I-1 tend *PRO*-1 to take myself to the movies or zone out with something
